scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.build:ui:dev: cd ../client/ && npm run build && cp -R build ../server && cd ../server && npm run clean:client
scripts.build:ui:prod: cd ../client/ && npm run build:prod && cp -R build ../server && cd ../server && npm run clean:client
scripts.start:dev: npm run clean:all && npm run build:ui:dev && node index.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run clean:all && npm run build:ui:prod
